Bizarre BZ394 Nissan Silvia (S12) 1988 Rallye C么te d'Ivoire Winner A. Ambrosino/D. Le Saux

Purchased: 2011
Manufacturer page: http://www.bizarremodel.com/pics/bz394.html

Only WRC win for Alain Ambrosino.
9th WRC win for Nissan.
Only WRC win for Silvia (S12).

Although Nissan continued racing in the WRC until 1992 this would be the last win for Nissan in the WRC. To make it somewhat more embarrassing, the Rallye C么te d'Ivoire was not part of the Manufacturers' Championship that season.
